name: Duck Rescue!
description:
Duck Rescue! is a cute little game about saving some ducks. It was made for Mini Jam 108 in under 72 hours. You can play it right here in your browser and it's pretty short so why don't you give it a try!

Controls:

Click the crabs to "disable" them. 'P' to mute the music, 'R' to restart a level.
